raw_body:
On 24–25 September 2025, the RAI in Amsterdam will host TechEx Europe, an event that brings together 8,000+ participants and 250+ speakers in five co-located events: AI & Big Data Expo, Cyber Security & Cloud Expo, IoT Tech Expo, Digital Transformation Week, and Data Centre Expo. The event offers opportunities to engage with peer executives […]
The post TechEx Europe 2025: Practical learnings for AI leaders appeared first on AI News.
speedrun: TechEx Europe 2025 is set for September 24-25 in Amsterdam, attracting over 8,000 participants and 250 speakers. This event will feature five co-located expos covering AI, cybersecurity, IoT, digital transformation, and data centers. It aims to facilitate networking and knowledge sharing among industry leaders. This gathering is significant as it highlights the growing importance of collaboration in the rapidly evolving tech landscape.
why_it_matters: AI leaders will gain insights and networking opportunities, which could enhance their strategic initiatives. This could lead to improved collaboration and innovation.
The event reflects a broader trend of integrating technology sectors, suggesting that companies must adapt to stay competitive in a converging market.

lenses.eli12: TechEx Europe 2025 is a big tech gathering in Amsterdam where thousands will learn about AI and more. Think of it as a massive school for tech where leaders share ideas. For everyday people, this means better tech solutions could be on the horizon as companies collaborate and innovate.
lenses.pm: For product managers and founders, TechEx Europe 2025 presents a chance to understand user needs and emerging trends across multiple tech sectors. Engaging with industry leaders could inspire new product ideas and improve efficiency. Attending this event could also help in identifying partnership opportunities that enhance product offerings.
lenses.engineer: From a technical perspective, TechEx Europe 2025 will showcase advancements across various sectors, including AI and IoT. With over 250 speakers, attendees will likely encounter discussions on cutting-edge models and benchmarks. This event could provide valuable insights into emerging technologies and best practices for implementation.
